raw_text: MAHINDA BANDARA WARAKAULLE – It is with deep sorrow that we mourn the loss of MAHINDA BANDARA WARAKAULLE. He will be lovingly remembered by his wife Bernadette,​ his two children Dilenthi and Keshan,​ his son-in-law Jeff,​ daughter-in-law Niranga,​ his three beautiful grandchildren Keara,​ Jia and Manit. He was the beloved son of Chandradasa and Anula Warakaulle (deceased),​ loving brother of Sorani Perera,​ Monica Athureliya and Damayanthi Perera,​ brother-in-law to Nimal Perera and a much loved uncle to Shanath,​ Dulshan,​ Prasadini,​ Piyumali and Shanilka. Words cannot express how much he will be missed. May he attain the Supreme Bliss of Nibbana !057953

RANASINGHE,​ NORMAN MATTHEW – Beloved husband of Dr. Paxie (Ranaweera),​ son of the late Richard and Stephanie Ranasinghe,​ dearest father of Shalendra,​ Dinuke and Roshie,​ grandfather of Ruby,​ Olivia,​ Ori,​ Alexander and Joshua,​ brother of Leonard (Deceased),​ Anita (Deceased),​ Maurice (Deceased) and of Elmo and Iranganie,​ expired in Sydney Australia. d​o​c​t​o​r​p​a​x​i​e​@​a​o​l​.​c​o​m​057798
